price: Na akaufanya mwezi ndani yake uwe nuru, na akalifanya jua kuwa taa?
arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا
footnotes: Na akaufanya mwezi katika mbingu hizo unatoa nuru, na akalifanya jua ni taa ambayo kwayo watu wa duniani ndio wanaona kwa mwangaza wake yote wanayo hitajia kuyaona?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajaʿala al-qamara fīhinna nūran wajaʿala al-shamsa sirājan
